This report includes forward-looking statements and estimates of future performance that may differ from actual results because of 
uncertainties and risks encountered in day-to-day business.2022 Corporate Responsibility and Sustainability Report
Sustainability Snapshot 
Safe, reliable, affordable and sustainable energy powers our communities. By growing our use of 
clean energy, advancing energy efficiency and electrifying transportation, we can meet our goal of deep carbon reductions by 2030 and net-zero carbon electricity by 2050.
